graduationDescription: Completed my degree in IT Management at Fatec Itaquaquecetuba, building a strong foundation in technology.
beginnerDescription: Started my career as a Junior Developer, working with Angular 7, TypeScript, and HTML5 to create dynamic interfaces.
intermediateDescription: Advanced to Mid-level Developer, contributing to financial sector projects using Angular 9 and GraphQL.
postgraduateAgileDescription: Completed a postgraduate degree in Software Development with Agile Methodologies at Anhembi Morumbi University.
advancedDescription: Worked as a Senior Developer, leading high-complexity projects in the real estate sector using Angular and NgRx.
postgraduateUXDescription: Enhanced my user-centered design knowledge with a specialization in UX at Anhembi Morumbi University.
techLeadDescription: Currently working as a Front-end Tech Lead, leading teams and delivering efficient solutions for financial and real estate clients.
projectsSubtitle: Here are some of the personal projects I’ve developed.
financialDashboardDescription: The Personal Finance Dashboard is an intuitive tool for managing your finances. It allows you to record categorized incomes and expenses, view detailed histories, and track interactive charts showing trends, projections, and spending percentages. Built with React.js, Redux, and Chart.js, the dashboard is responsive and offers light and dark modes for better usability.
ecommercePlatformDescription: The E-commerce Platform allows the creation of online stores with product management, shopping cart, and payment integration. Fully responsive and developed with modern technologies such as Angular, Tailwind CSS, and Node.js.
recipeManagerDescription: The Recipe Manager is a full stack project, developed with Angular on the frontend and Node.js on the backend, enabling seamless integration between user interfaces and server logic. The application that allows users to add, edit, delete and view recipes organized into categories such as Desserts, Main Dishes, Appetizers, Healthy Options, Snacks, and Drinks. It includes features to mark recipes as favorites, manage user profiles, and track dynamic achievements. Developed with Angular, Node.js, and SCSS, the project was designed with a mobile-first approach but is fully responsive for all screen sizes. The design was created from scratch without using external libraries, ensuring a unique and personalized appearance. Additionally, it uses smooth animations to enhance the user experience.
cv: The resume language will be the same as the one selected in the application.
